resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106171</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106171</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211964</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Rio Tinto Images</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rio Tinto Bilder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Images de Rio Tinto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imagens De Rio Tinto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagini De Rio Tinto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες του Ρίο Tinto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Imágenes De Río Tinto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This collection of images highlights the Rio Tinto area of Spain, specifically where the NASA Mars Analog Research and Technology Experiment (MARTE) took place. The site includes links to related news releases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Ansammlung Bilder markiert den Rio Tinto 
Bereich von Spanien, spezifisch, wo das die NASA Mars analoge 
Forschung und Technologie-Experiment (MARTE) stattfand. Die Site
schließt Links zu in Verbindung stehenden Nachrichten Freigaben ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette collection d'images met en valeur la région
de Rio Tinto de l'Espagne, spécifiquement où l'expérience 
analogique de recherches et de technologie de la NASA Mars (MARTE) a 
eu lieu. Le site inclut des liens aux versions relatives de 
nouvelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta coleção das imagens destaca a área de Rio 
Tinto de Spain, especificamente onde a experiência análoga da 
pesquisa e da tecnologia da NASA Marte (MARTE) ocorreu. O local 
inclui as ligações às liberações relacionadas da notícia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa accumulazione delle immagini evidenzia la 
regione de Rio Tinto della Spagna, specificamente dove l'esperimento 
analog di ricerca e di tecnologia della NASA Marte (MARTE) ha 
avvenuto. Il luogo include i collegamenti alle versioni relative
di notizie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η συλλογή των εικόνων δίνει έμφαση στην περιοχή
του Ρίο Tinto της Ισπανίας, συγκεκριμένα όπου το αναλογικό 
πείραμα έρευνας και τεχνολογίας της NASA Αρης (MARTE) 
πραγματοποιήθηκε. Η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει τις συνδέσεις με τα
σχετικά δελτία ειδήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta colección de imágenes destaca el área de 
Río Tinto de España, específicamente donde ocurrió el experimento 
analogico de la investigación y de la tecnología de la NASA Marte 
(MARTE). El sitio incluye conexiones a los desbloquear 
relacionados de las noticias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CAROL STOKER
FN:CAROL STOKER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:NASA AMES RESEARCH CENTER
FN:NASA AMES RESEARCH CENTER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211964</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106171</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/rio-tinto-images</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
